title: U.S. Companies Pick Up Adoption of Libor Alternative SOFR
sub_head: Sports-vehicle maker Polaris is among the businesses beginning to use a replacement benchmark
body:
Major U.S. companies are dumping the London interbank offered rate ahead of a year-end deadline for abandoning the troubled short-term interest-rate benchmark.
Sports-vehicle maker Polaris Inc . recently selected Wall Streetâ€™s preferred alternative, the Secured Overnight Financing Rate, as its new benchmark rate to provide inventory financing to vehicle dealers as part of a business it runs with Wells Fargo & Co.
